import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useSinglePost from "../custom-hooks/useSinglePost"; import "../css/SinglePost.css" import MD from 'react-markdown' import usePosts from "../custom-hooks/usePosts" import {getPosts2} from "../contentful" function SinglePost() { const { id } = useParams() // const [post, isLoading] = useSinglePost(id); const [posts, isLoading] = usePosts(); const santizingPosts = posts.filter(post => post.fields.slug === id); console.log('bbbb',santizingPosts) const [data, setData] = useState(null) useEffect(() =>{ console.log('santizingPosts',santizingPosts) const newData = santizingPosts[0] setData(newData) },[]) console.log('newData',data) /* return( <>
Back to All Blog Posts

{newData.fields.title}

{newData.fields.dateTime}
Share
Tweet
Share
) */ return(true) } export default SinglePost
